channel.title: Belief on mental excess.
channel.description: Recent content in Belief on mental excess.

item.title: Processing it All.
item.description: I think it’s easy to fill compelled to capture as much knowledge as possible. I always want to go through all my RSS feeds, read every article that seems remotely interesting, and be complete by the end of the day. More information, however, just isn’t helpful. Constantly we are inundated with data and the idea that we must always be consuming. It’s accepted as the baseline, but it’s honestly exhausting to actually do, if you think about it.
